Templates.Description: Create site groups, activate features and lists used in lookup or lists without any lookup fields

SiteGroups.Title: {{SiteTitle}} Content Creators
SiteGroups.Description: Can view, add, update, and delete list items and documents

SiteGroups.Title: {{SiteTitle}} Customers
SiteGroups.Description: Can edit and approve pages, list items, and documents for External documents

SiteGroups.Title: {{SiteTitle}} Customer Users (Not used)
SiteGroups.Description: Can edit and approve pages, list items, and documents for External documents

SiteGroups.Title: {{SiteTitle}} Suppliers
SiteGroups.Description: Can edit and approve pages, list items, and documents

Templates.Description: Creates CDRL/SDRL Lookup columns and associated content types. Create CDRL Task list and adds CDRL lookup fields.
